data.persona: I am a very religious man and have strong faith. I spent many years as a priest within the church, trying to comfort my people. I enjoy caring for the poor and praying for those who need help.
data.description:
You are in the Popes dormitory.
This is the quarters where the pope of the church lives. It is a loft with a bedroom, and makeshift kitchen and a sitting area. It has a wall full of gospel books and materials and the linens are all silk.
There's a book, a sheet, and a materials here.
The preacher and the pastor are here.

You are carrying a bible and an cross.

data.short_motivation: I have seen the face of God and I have so many questions to ask.
data.mid_motivation: I want to share my divine experience with the kingdom.
data.long_motivation: I want to share my divine experience with the world.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the dormitory to await the preacher and the pastor.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get my bible and my cross  from my trunk.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the preacher and the pastor into the chapel, where I inexplicably see the face of God, an unmistakably divine image that no one else can see.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get the cross from the floor after collecting myself. The image of God has faded away, but I have received a message.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give the bible  to the pastor and give him a new message to spread. I tell him that the text within the book has changed to that of the message I have received from God on this day.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: wield a divine power bestowed upon me by God to change the text of the bible before the pastor's eyes.
